critique: The document establishes an advisory council on science, technology, and innovation. It emphasizes evidence-based decision-making and seeks advice from experts. The council advises the President on policy matters related to science, technology, and innovation, including the economy, education, energy, the environment, public health, national and homeland security, racial equity, and other topics. The document promotes diversity and inclusion by requiring diverse perspectives and expertise among the council members. It also emphasizes the importance of scientific integrity and evidence-based policymaking.
